definition[0]: things that you throw away, such as empty bottles, used papers, food that has gone bad etc
example[0]: Will someone take out the trash  (=take it outside the house)?
example[1]: Just put it in the trash.
definition[1]: something that is of very poor quality
example[2]: How can you read that trash?
definition[2]: someone from a low social class who you do not respect because you think they are lazy or immoral
definition[3]: to destroy something completely, either deliberately or by using it too much
example[3]: The place got trashed last time we had a party.
definition[4]: to criticize someone or something very severely
example[4]: The researchers are angry that attempts have been made to trash their work.
